item.title: Beocord 9000: Displays and Lamps
item.description:
This Beocord 9000 project was on hold until new Beolover displays arrived. In the meantime, basic functionality was confirmed - the Beocord can record and play cassettes. With the displays here, the next steps are to install them, conduct thorough cassette operation tests, and share the outcome. The display work can be done without removing the Microcomputer and Display board. This image provides a top view of the display setup, highlighting the PPM scale lamp...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/beocord-9000-displays-and-lamps/
